content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -13.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
The lab is currently not engaged in any research.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
The assembling machine is set to produce automation science packs but is not receiving electricity and lacks the necessary resources (copper plate and iron gear wheel).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to furnace fuel
- Ensure to have coal in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace. Check your inventory for available resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to assembling machine resources
- Verify that you have all the required ingredients (copper plate and iron gear wheel) in your inventory before setting the recipe in the assembling machine.
